cardTypes.name: Feral
cardTypes.tooltip: Can attack when this zombie enters the battleground

cardTypes.name: Heavy
cardTypes.tooltip: Enemies must attack this zombie first

mechanics.name: Entry
mechanics.tooltip: Ability activates when this zombie enters the battleground

mechanics.name: Death
mechanics.tooltip: Ability activates when this zombie dies

mechanics.name: Attack
mechanics.tooltip: Ability activates when this zombie attacks

mechanics.name: Freeze
mechanics.tooltip: Freezes any zombie it damages - a frozen zombie loses it's next turn

mechanics.name: Flash
mechanics.tooltip: This zombie can attack twice

mechanics.name: Destroy
mechanics.tooltip: Zombies damaged by this are removed from battleground

mechanics.name: Distract
mechanics.tooltip: Zombie with this status is unable to use it's ability

mechanics.name: Swing X
mechanics.tooltip: Deal X damage to zombies that are adjacent to target

mechanics.name: Rage X
mechanics.tooltip: If damaged, get +X attack

mechanics.name: Delayed X
mechanics.tooltip: Ability activates after X turns in play

mechanics.name: Turn
mechanics.tooltip: Ability activates at the start of each turn while in play

mechanics.name: End
mechanics.tooltip: Ability activates at the end of each turn while in play

mechanics.name: Overflow X
mechanics.tooltip: Get X Goo over the max goo available, for this turn only

mechanics.name: Guard
mechanics.tooltip: Guard will absorb the next attack completely and be removed

mechanics.name: Devour
mechanics.tooltip: Killing a zombie will gain it's attack and / or defense values

mechanics.name: Shatter X
mechanics.tooltip: Deal +X damage to Frozen enemies

mechanics.name: Reanimate
mechanics.tooltip: Resummon this zombie when it is Destroyed

mechanics.name: Restore
mechanics.tooltip: n/a

mechanics.name: Chainsaw
mechanics.tooltip: n/a

mechanics.name: Blitz
mechanics.tooltip: Can attack zombies when this enters the battleground
